main: Deals bonus damage based on missing HP%.
S2 gives {status:Breath} and inflicts {status:Laceration} Count based on {status:Laceration} Potency on the target.
S3 gains Power with {keyword:Envy} Reson and even more at 6 A-Reson and inflicts more {status:Laceration} at lower HP%.
other: Passive gives him {status:AttackUp} and {status:DefenseUp} whenever allies are attacked.

1070701.desc:
Gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp] next turn every time an ally (including this unit) is attacked. (Max 6)
Deal more damage at less HP.
- Deal +0.4% damage for every 1% missing HP
1070701.name: Mutilated Tattoos

1070711.desc:
Gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp] next turn every time an ally (including this unit) is attacked. Gain 2 of each instead if the ally is from The Pequod. (Max 9)
Deal more damage the less HP this unit has.
- Deal +1% damage for every 1% missing HP
1070711.name: Mutilated Tattoos

1070721.desc:
1 ally with the highest max HP deals more Pierce Damage at less HP
- Deal +0.15% damage for every 1% missing HP (Max 15%)
1070721.name: Desperation

1070731.desc:
1 ally with the highest max HP deals more Pierce Damage at less HP
- Deal +0.3% damage for every 1% missing HP (Max 30%)
1070731.name: Desperation
